events.name: You don't wanna cry - GDG Kozhikode Event

venue.name: Multi Purpose Hall, 7th Floor,Hilite Business Park
venue.address_1: HiLITE Business Park, Poovangal, Pantheeramkavu, Kerala 673014

events.description:
Ever imagined about seeing your or your relatives private images or videos online? How disappointing that will be?  

Yes it is! and Nothing can be done after it is out there!  Each and everyone  have to be aware of the precautions and security measures which is there and implement it! 

GDG Kozhikode is organizing a awareness session about :

Register at https://goo.gl/forms/3dFaxWXr3TG3CPo03

Understanding Internet Security- Viruses , Trojan, Cyber threats

Privacy issues of smartphones and devices

Hacking online accounts and Devices

Wanna Cry Ransom ware and its impact.

How much danger can a computer virus bring to human life just like a viral disease . 

How can Computer virus effect a personal life.

How to protect yourself

Demo

Speaker :Sreenath Sashikumar, Founder , CEO , Mashup Academy

Deputy Commander at Kerala Police Cyberdome

Board Member at OWASP Kerala

Former Senior Software Engineer at Digital Brand Group

Former Senior Software Engineer at QBurst

Former Software Engineer at IBM India

Event is Free !

Date :  Saturday, May 27th  2017 . Time : 10:00 am - 12:00 pmPlace :Multi purpose Hall, 7th Floor, HiLITE Business Park, Poovangal, Pantheeramkavu, Kerala[masked]Map: https://goo.gl/zj74FY

Contact Person :  Jinu[masked]

Google Developer Group Kozhikode, Mashsup Academy, Hilite Builders, CAFIT

events.name: Google IO Extended Kozhikode 2017

venue.name: Webnamaste Consulting Pvt Ltd
venue.address_1: 5th Floor, HiLITE Business Park, Poovangal, Pantheeramkavu, Kerala 673014

events.description:
Updates from Google's annual  developer conference in Kozhikode ! 

What you can expect at Google IO Extended Kozhikode 2017 -

Updates from Google IO 2017.Introduction to Kotlin.How to create human centric web experience.Know each other, build professional connections.Lunch and Networking.Swags.

How to create human centric web experience byRadhakrishnan K G Founder , CEO , Webnamaste Consulting Pvt Ltd.Inbound Marketing Expert.

Hands on introduction to Kotlin, Statically typed programming language for modern multiplatform applications byAjith V , App Developer SoftFruit Solutions.

Event is Free !  You will be getting an confirmation mail if your seats are booked.

Date :  Sunday, June 11th  2017 . Time : 10:00 am - 01:00 pmPlace :Webnamaste Consulting Pvt. Ltd, 5th Floor, HiLITE Business Park, Poovangal, Pantheeramkavu, Kerala[masked]Map: https://goo.gl/5ySVaL

Contact Person :  Jinu[masked]

More about Speaker for session How to create human centric web experience.

RK is the Founder/Director of WebNamaste, an awardwinningDigital Marketing Agency in Calicut (Kerala). He has a team of about 30 young, bright and smart professionalswith specialization in Inbound Marketing, Social media, Copywriting, Design & Development. He received his dualdegree with a Bachelors in Technology in Computer Science, and Bachelors in Science in Applied Biotechnology fromBangalore University. He also holds a Diploma in Human Resource Management from Rai Business School, Bangalore.

He speaks 5 Indian languages in addition to English. Rk is a passionate traveler, plays music instruments and is anabsolute foodie. He recently accomplished his mission of traveling to 30 countries by the age 30. During his school and college days, he has won several awards in performing music. He plays Violin, Guitar, Flute and Piano.Also associated with Junior Chamber International, he was conferred upon as a Senator. He is an active Rotarian, andhave represented India as a Youth Ambassador in the USA in 2013, and have addressed elite audience and legendaryestablishments such as NASA & PayPal.

He is a member of NASSCOM, and have actively participated in mentoring programs where he helped Startup to createan effective business plan. He has also served as the Secretary and the Governing Board of Calicut Forum for IT, an ITpromotion council in the Malabar Region. 

Google Developer Group Kozhikode, Webnamaste Consulting Pvt Ltd.

events.name: Let's Goooooo - Go Programming Language handson session

venue.name: Kerala Startup Mission
venue.address_1: UL Cyber Park, Kozhikode, Kerala, India

events.description:
Go is an open source programming language that makes it easy to build simple, reliable, and efficient software. GDG Kozhikode is conducting a hands on session about Go programming language.
Register at - http://bit.ly/gdgletsgo
What you can expect-
1. Introduction to Go.
2. Setting up your environment (GOPATH)
3. Basic data types
4. Control flow.
5. A first look at goroutines.
Speaker :
Noufal Ibrahim is the founder of Hamon technologies LLP and is a veteran programmer and trainer.
He was the founder of PyCon India and is a member of the Python Software Foundation. He mostly specialises in the infrastructure and automation spaces and currently conducts a mentoring program for recent graduates and fresh engineers under his Kozhikode based institute, The Lycaeum.
Pre requisites.
- Participants should have some familiarity with programming in any language.
- Participants should have some familiarity with a general purpose editor
- Participants should have Go installed on their computer. You can get it from https://golang.org/dl/
Event is Free ! but registration is compulsory .
Date : Saturday, July 22nd 2017 .
Time : 10:00 am - 1:00 pm
Place : KSUM Space, UL Cyber Park, Nellikode (PO), Kozhikode, Kerala[masked]
Map: https://goo.gl/maps/aBaZxNpjVKJ2
Contact Person : Jinu[masked]
Google Developer Group Kozhikode, Kerala Startup Mission.

events.description:

6)React native
7) Networking

events.name: TensorFlow Dev Summit Extended 18

venue.name: Kerala Startup Mission
venue.address_1: UL Cyber Park, Kozhikode, Kerala, India

events.description:
TensorFlow Dev Summit Extended brings together a diverse mix of machine learning users from around the world for a full day of highly technical talks, demos, and conversation with the TensorFlow team and community.

It is no question that machine learning is one of the hottest and one of the most important technology topics for developers and we think you can use this as an opportunity to build local machine learning community or engage with your local machine learning users!

What you can expect from TensorFlow Dev Summit Extended :
- Highlights of the TensorFlow Dev Summit 18.
- Introduction to machine learning and TensorFlow.
- TensorFlow codelabs.
- Networking.

Please carry a laptop if you are interested in attending codelabs.

#TensorFlow #DevSummit #Extended #GDGKozhikode #WTMKozhikode

GDG Kozhikode, WTM Kozhikode and Kerala Startup Mission.

events.name: Google Cloud Study Jam MES
events.description:
“Machine learning will automate jobs that most people thought could only be done by people.” ~Dave Waters _

_Need a break from studying? Do you want to learn about the next biggest thing in the world of computer engineering?_

If so then come along to the Google Cloud study jam which will be conducted by GDG Kozhikode in collaboration with the Student Club of MESCE on the topic _Machine Learning using cloud_ which will be held on 14th of March 2019

Venue : MES College of Engineering
Time : 9:30 am to 4:30 am

Hurry up! Limited seats are available.
